name: accountCreateAnonymousSession
description: Use this endpoint to allow a new user to register an anonymous account in your project. This route will also create a new session for the user. To allow the new user to convert an anonymous account to a normal account, you need to update its [email and password](/docs/client/account#accountUpdateEmail) or create an [OAuth2 session](/docs/client/account#accountCreateOAuth2Session).

$ul: **clientCode**: Client code name. View list of [available options](https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/blob/master/docs/lists/clients.json).
**current**: Returns true if this the current user session.
**expire**: Session expiration date in Unix timestamp.
**ip**: IP in use when the session was created.
**osCode**: Operating system code name. View list of [available options](https://github.com/appwrite/appwrite/blob/master/docs/lists/os.json).
